author: JamesWTruher
body:
Migrate a large number of Pester tests which currently run on Windows PowerShell to PowerShell Core
- [X] Code is up-to-date with `master`.
- [X] Add tests that fail without your changes.

This PR contains roughly 1600 new tests (400 of which are marked pending or skipped). This will increase our test count by more than 100%
Still to do is correct tagging and categorization of tests

comments.author: vors
comments.body:
- Please, convert map.json to ASCII / UTF8
- Please use `git commit --author="PowerShell Team <PowerShellTeam@hotmail.com>"` for copying mapped files (you would need to do an interactive rebase to fix this).

comments.author: JamesWTruher
comments.body: i'm going to break this up into multiple PRs

title: Jimtru/pester test migration
